Issue.creator: harsha544
Issue.summary: Recent Updates to Makefile breaks make docker
Issue.description: 44c2eaa37868 Step 2/3 : COPY baseimage /tmp/baseimage ---> Using cache ---> c596ffdeeb1d Step 3/3 : RUN cd /tmp/baseimage && bash install.sh && rm -rf /tmp/baseimage ---> Using cache ---> 533a50c32f27 Successfully built 533a50c32f27 Successfully tagged hyperledger/cello-baseimage:latest Successfully tagged hyperledger/cello-baseimage:ppc64le-0.8.0-snapshot-bf06e57 /bin/sh: 5: @touch: not found Makefile:104: recipe for target 'build/docker/baseimage/.ppc64le-0.8.0-snapshot-bf06e57' failed make: *** build/docker/baseimage/.ppc64le-0.8.0-snapshot-bf06e57 Error 127 Will be pushing a PR to fix on the same. >
